S

solve() - Method in class com.optimusprice.service.SolverService
Solves the optimization problem and distributes payments across available methods.
SolverService - Class in com.optimusprice.service
SolverService uses linear optimization to assign orders to payment methods in a way that maximizes total discount and respects payment method limits.
